Class LegendRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.charting.components.Component
      • com.mindfusion.charting.LegendRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.mindfusion.charting.components.RootControl

    public class LegendRenderer
extends com.mindfusion.charting.components.Component
    A component that renders chart legend.
